name: True Golf Classics: Pebble Beach Golf Links
name_original: True Golf Classics: Pebble Beach Golf Links
description:
True Golf Classics: Pebble Beach Golf Links (New 3D Golf Simulation: ペブルビーチの波濤, New 3D Golf Simulation: Peburubīchi no hatō, lit. "New 3D Golf Simulation: Storm Wave of Pebble Beach") is a traditional golf simulation video game that was originally released in 1992 for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. It was eventually released in 1993 to the Sega Genesis and the NEC PC9801. It is part of T&E Soft's True Golf series.

The game takes place at the prestigious Pebble Beach Golf Links in Pebble Beach, California.
